sen.j: 白子（しらこ）は、主に魚類の精巣を食材とする際の呼び名。
sen.e: Shirako is the name of the milt of fish when the milt is used as ingredients in various dishes.
Shirako is the name of the milt of fish when the milt is used as ingredients in various dishes.
Shirako is the name of the milt of fish when the milt is used as ingredients in various dishes.

sen.j: タラ、アンコウ、フグなどの成熟した白子は味が良く、酢の物、汁物、鍋料理、焼く (調理)などとして食べる。
sen.e: Matured milt of cod, angler fish, and pufferfish is tasty, used in vinegared dishes, soup, and nabe dishes, or grilled.
Matured milt of cod, angler fish, and pufferfish is tasty, used in vinegared dishes, soup, and nabe dishes, or grilled.
Matured milt of cod, angler fish, and pufferfish is tasty, used in vinegared dishes, soup, and nabe dishes, or grilled.

sen.j: 通常、75-82%の水分、1-5%の脂肪を含み、プロタミン（ヒストン）、ヌクレオプロテインなどの強塩基性蛋白質やポリアミンを多く含むのが特徴とされる。
sen.e: Milt is characterized by normally containing 75-82 % water and 1-5 % fat, plenty of strong-basic protein such as protamine (histone) and nucleoprotein, and polyamine.
Milt is characterized in that it normally contains 75-82 % water and 1-5 % fat, plenty of strong-basic protein such as protamine (histone) and nucleoprotein, and polyamine.
sen.cmt: 冒頭の文構成の見直し
sen.e: Milt is characterized in that it normally contains 75-82 % water and 1-5 % fat, plenty of strong-basic protein such as protamine (histone) and nucleoprotein, and polyamine.

sen.j: 遺伝子としてのデオキシリボ核酸も高濃度で含む。
sen.e: It also contains a high level of deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA).
It also contains a high level of deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA).
It also contains a high level of deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA).

sen.j: フグの身や内臓には猛毒であるテトロドトキシンが蓄積される。
sen.e: The pufferfish hoards the lethal poison tetrodotoxin in its flesh and internal organs.
The pufferfish hoards the lethal poison tetrodotoxin in its flesh and internal organs.
The pufferfish hoards the lethal poison tetrodotoxin in its flesh and internal organs.

sen.j: どこに蓄積されるかはフグの種類ごとに違うが、白子は比較的テトロドトキシンが蓄積される種が少なく（皆無ではない）、うまみも芳醇であることから食用に供される。
sen.e: Where they hoard the tetrodotoxin differs with each kind, and a few kinds hoard it in their milt, which is mellow and so used for food.
Where they hoard the tetrodotoxin differs in each kind, but only a few kinds of pufferfish hoard the tetrodotoxin in their milt, which is mellow; so the milt is used for food.
Where they hoard the tetrodotoxin differs in each kind, but only a few kinds of pufferfish hoard the tetrodotoxin in their milt, which is mellow; so the milt is used for food.

sen.j: サケの白子は主にDNAやプロタミンの抽出材料として利用され、核酸系調味料、強化剤、保存料、工業原料などにも利用されている。
sen.e: Salmon milt is mainly used for extracting DNA and protamine, and also used for nucleic acid seasoning, nutrient supplement, preservatives, and industrial material.
Salmon milt is mainly used for extracting DNA and protamine, and also used for nucleic acid seasoning, nutrient supplement, preservatives, and industrial material.
Salmon milt is mainly used for extracting DNA and protamine, and also used for nucleic acid seasoning, nutrient supplement, preservatives, and industrial material.

sen.j: 北海道でタラの白子は「タチ（タツ）」、岩手県では「きく」、秋田県、山形県、福井県では「だだみ」と呼ばれ、後志支庁管内ではかまぼこにも加工される。
sen.e: Cod milt is called "Tachi (Tatsu) in Hokkaido, "Kiku" in Iwate Prefecture, "Dadami" in Akita Prefecture, Yamagata Prefecture, and Fukui Prefecture, and is processed into Kamaboko (steamed fish paste) within the jurisdiction area of Shiribeshi branch office, Hokkaido.

Cod milt is called "Tachi (Tatsu) in Hokkaido, "Kiku" in Iwate Prefecture, "Dadami" in Akita Prefecture, Yamagata Prefecture, and Fukui Prefecture, and is processed into Kamaboko (steamed fish paste) within the jurisdiction area of Shiribeshi branch office, Hokkaido.

Cod milt is called "Tachi (Tatsu) in Hokkaido, "Kiku" in Iwate Prefecture, "Dadami" in Akita Prefecture, Yamagata Prefecture, and Fukui Prefecture, and is processed into Kamaboko (steamed fish paste) within the jurisdiction area of Shiribeshi branch office, Hokkaido.

sen.j: 近年は海外からも輸入されている。
sen.e: It has been imported from abroad in recent years.
It has been imported from abroad in recent years.
It has been imported from abroad in recent years.

sen.j: ポン酢、鍋物の具材、天ぷら、ソテー、吸い物、味噌汁
sen.e: With Ponzu sauce (juice pressed from bitter oranges), for nabe dishes, tempura, saute, broth, and miso soup.
With Ponzu sauce (juice pressed from bitter oranges), for nabe dishes, tempura, saute, broth, and miso soup.
